name: Antenna Rangers
description:
Welcome to Antenna Installations Inc., where an Alien Slime and his robotic friend have infiltrated to destabilize its core! However, once the robot gets out of the alien's range, it gets out of control, so you'll have to think it twice if you want to make it to the core...

Keyboard controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move.
  • Q to retrieve robot and swap characters.

Gamepad controls:

  • Left analog or DPAD to move.
  • R1/RT or Triangle/Y to retrieve robot and swap characters.
